 II. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צִי‎</span>] **noun masculine**<sup>[[Jer.50.39|Jer 50:39]]</sup> ==a wild beast==, properly either ==desert-dweller== (denominative from <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צִיָּה‎</span>, so most), or ==crier, yelper== (√ \*<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צוה‎</span> = <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> [***yelp***, [[BDB#Dozy|Dozy]]], [[BDB#Ba|Ba]]<sup>NB 188</sup>, compare [[BDB#Ew|Ew]]<sup>§ 146 g, note</sup>); — in any case a specific animal, but not certainly identified; [[BDB#Bo|Bo]]<sup>Hieroz. i, lib. 3, § 14</sup>, compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***wild cat***; — plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צִיִּים‎</span> [[Isa.13.21|Isa 13:21]] (feminine <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אִיִּים‎</span> v[[Isa.13.22|Isa 13:22]]), [[Isa.23.13|Isa 23:13]]; [[Isa.34.14|Isa 34:14]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אִיִּים‎</span>), [[Jer.50.39|Jer 50:39]] (***id.***; all betokening desolation); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְעַם לְצ‎</span> [[Ps.74.14|Ps 74:14]] (read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְעַם צ‎</span> [[BDB#Hup|Hup-Now]] [[BDB#Bae|Bae]]); apparently of people [[Ps.72.9|Ps 72:9]], but probably corrupt, [[BDB#Ol|Ol]] conjectures <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צָרִים‎</span> (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֹיְבָיו‎</span>), and so most moderns.
